expo.name: LiveSessions-app
expo.description:
Hi there!

There is my native app as a final bootcamp project

Here you can register a user as an ARTIST or as a PROMOTER, do login, once you are already autneticate as an Artist you can edit your profile, add links to youtube, bandcamp, spotify, and select a profile picture also if you have some live sessions proposals you can accept or denied it. As a promoter you can also edit your profile, select a profile picture and you can search artist by genre (Rock) for example, and then submit a live petition, then you can edit the live petition if you did any mistake and you can also select a picture for the live petition, after that if the artist accepts or denies the petition you will see how the STATE of the petition change from "pending" Â´to "accepted" or "denied".

Any doubt or question you might have don't doubt to reach me at: 

https://www.linkedin.com/in/cristian-manzano/

and also Have a nice day! :)
